tool_description: Anime Streaming, Discovery API made with Cheerio and Express. Uses data from Gogoanime
name: Gogoanime
title: Gogoanime

api_list.name: Top Airing
api_list.description: returns a list of top airing anime

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: page limit [1-26]. -1 to fetch all the pages avaliable **Note: Waiting time will be much longer.**

api_list.name: Anime Movies
api_list.description: Returns a list of anime movies

optional_parameters.name: aph
optional_parameters.description: by default the movie list is random. values are from [A-Z]. And 0 is Ascending order with page limit of [1-89].

api_list.name: Episode Thread
api_list.description: returns a list of comments for that episode

api_list.name: Streaming URLs
Anime Details
api_list.description: returns the anime details (including the episodes)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gogoanime2.p.rapidapi.com/anime-details/overlord-iv"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gogoanime2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gogoanime2.p.rapidapi.com/anime-details/{animeid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gogoanime2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Anime Genres

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page limit varies by genre

api_list.name: Popular Anime
api_list.description: Returns a list of popular anime

api_list.name: Recent Episodes
api_list.description: Returns a list of recent episodes

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: by default the type is `1`. type `1`: japanese with subtitle. type `2`: english dub with no subtitles. type `3`: chinese with english subtitles.
